               <td width="500" valign="top" style="height: 449px"> <h1> Shopping Cart Web Part <small>Version 2.1</small> </h1> 
                <ul class="css-tabs"> 
                 <li id="ctl00_defHolder_tabOverview"><a href="#Overview">Overview</a></li> 
                 <li id="ctl00_defHolder_tabFeatures"><a href="#Features">Features</a></li> 
                 <li id="ctl00_defHolder_tabGallery"><a href="#Gallery">Gallery</a></li> 
                 <li id="ctl00_defHolder_tabInstallation"><a href="#Installation">Installation</a></li> 
                 <li id="ctl00_defHolder_tabSystemRequirments"><a href="#Requirements">Requirements</a></li> 
                 <li id="ctl00_defHolder_tabDownload"><a href="#Download"><b>Download</b></a></li> 
                </ul> 
                <div class="css-panes"> 
                 <div> 
                  <br> 
                  <p> ArtfulBits Shopping Cart is intended to provide ecommerce functionality. This web part provides a possibility to exhibit items for sale, its basic information, photo, price, size, type or category, submit or resend an order and save order in history. </p> 
                  <p class="center"> <img src="../../images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/ov1.png" alt="Shopping Cart"> </p> 
                  <p> It allows providing different categories of goods for sale. Therefore it will be very easy to find a specific set of items for customer and filter them out: </p> 
                  <p class="center"> <img src="../../images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/ov2.png" id="ctl00_defHolder_Img4" alt="Shopping Cart"> </p> 
                  <p> You can preview pictures by clicking on them </p> 
                  <p class="center"> <img src="../../images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/ov3.png" id="ctl00_defHolder_Img5" alt="Shopping Cart"> </p> 
                  <p> While product is still in the cart, a customer can remove it. And after clicking on Order Now a process will continue: </p> 
                  <p class="center"> <img src="../../images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/ov4.png" id="ctl00_defHolder_Img6" alt="Shopping Cart"> </p> 
                  <p> After submitting the order, an administrator will receive a message with details of order and contact the customer. And the history of order will be kept for the customers, so that it was simple to make a repetitive order. </p> 
                  <h3> Feature List </h3>

                  <h3> Why ArtfulBits Shopping Cart Web Part? </h3> 
                  <p> ArtfulBits Shopping Cart is a simple and efficient solution for approaching your ecommerce processes. Most solutions available on the market offer complex and extremely packed solutions. However small and mid-size companies don’t need gigantic modules for ecommerce. Therefore ArtfulBits provided a simple tool that provides a commonly used set of functionalities: cart view, goods shelves, and information about products, categories of products, variations of the same product by size or other category with the possibility to filter and preview picture. Also a history of purchases is kept in the cart. This modules can be easily enhanced and is an ideal solution for small business, as it will quickly enables you to start selling on you site. Also it is very straightforward when it comes to configuration and is intuitively understandable. </p> 
                 </div>

                  <div id="ctl00_defHolder_InstallationProcess1_pContent"> 
                   <h4> Preparation for Installation</h4> 
                   <p> Before installation, please, check that your target server meets <a href="shopping-cart.aspx#Requirements"> Shopping Cart Web Part system requirements</a>. </p> 
                   <div id="ctl00_defHolder_InstallationProcess1_pInstallLicenseManager"> 
                    <p> Also, it is recommended to install <a href="license-manager.aspx#Overview">ArtfulBits License Manager</a> before (if it is not installed). </p> 
                   </div> 
                   <br> 
                   <!-- Accordion --> 
                   <div id="accordion" style="width: 500px;"> 
                    <h3> <a> 1. Installation</a></h3> 
                    <div> 
                     <p> Download Shopping Cart Web Part <a href="shopping-cart.aspx#Download">installation package</a> from ArtfulBits website, unpack the file, and run <b>Setup.exe</b>: </p> 
                     <div class="thumbnail"> 
                      <a class="thumb" href="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Install_Folder.png" title="Run Setup.exe"> <img src="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Install_Folder_tmb.png" width="440" height="264" alt="Run Setup.exe"> </a> 
                     </div> 
                     <b>Note:</b> 
                     <p> You must be a SharePoint Farm Administrator for successful installation. Also "Windows SharePoint Administration" and "Windows SharePoint Timer" should be running on the server: </p> 
                     <table class="featurestable"> 
                      <tbody>
                       <tr> 
                        <td class="header"> SharePoint 2007 </td> 
                        <td class="header"> SharePoint 2010 </td> 
                       </tr> 
                       <tr> 
                        <td> 
                         <div class="thumbnail"> 
                          <a href="../../images/sharepoint/generic/check_services.png" title="Check SharePoint 2007 Services"> <img src="../../images/sharepoint/generic/check_services_tmb.png" alt="Check Services Sharepoint 2007" width="106" height="106"> </a> 
                         </div> </td> 
                        <td> 
                         <div class="thumbnail"> 
                          <a href="../../images/sharepoint/generic/check_services_sp2010.png" title="Check SharePoint 2010 Services"> <img src="../../images/sharepoint/generic/check_services_sp2010_tmb.png" alt="Check Services Sharepoint 2010" width="200" height="111"> </a> 
                         </div> </td> 
                       </tr> 
                      </tbody>
                     </table> 
                     <p> After system check is finished, click "Next".</p> 
                     <div class="thumbnail"> 
                      <a href="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Install_Init.png" title="Installation init"> <img src="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Install_Init_tmb.png" width="440" height="384"> </a> 
                      <br> 
                      <a href="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Install_SystemCheck.png" title="System requirmnts check"> <img src="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Install_SystemCheck_tmb.png" width="440" height="384"> </a> 
                     </div> 
                     <p> After reading License Agreement, click "Accept" and go to next step. </p> 
                     <div class="thumbnail"> 
                      <a href="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Install_EULA.png" title="End User License Agreement"> <img src="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Install_EULA_tmb.png" width="440" height="384"> </a> 
                     </div> 
                     <p> Select one or more web applications and click "Next". </p> 
                     <div class="thumbnail"> 
                      <a href="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Install_Select_Site.png" title="Select web site"> <img src="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Install_Select_Site_tmb.png" width="440" height="384"> </a> 
                     </div> 
                     <p> Wait for install to succeed, click "Next" for deployment status details. </p> 
                     <div class="thumbnail"> 
                      <a href="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Install_Progress.png" title="Installation progress"> <img src="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Install_Progress_tmb.png" width="440" height="384"> </a> 
                      <br> 
                      <a href="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Install_End.png" title="Installation end"> <img src="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Install_End_tmb.png" width="440" height="384"> </a> 
                     </div> 
                    </div> 
                    <div id="ctl00_defHolder_InstallationProcess1_pLicenseManagement"> 
                     <h3> <a href="#"> 2. License Management</a></h3> 
                     <div> 
                      <p> Shopping Cart Web Part uses <b>Per-Farm License Model</b> (each license is bound to single SharePoint Farm ID). For more details about licensing models please visit <a title="License Info" target="_blank" href="/downloads/eula/sharepoint-components-end-user-license-agreement.pdf">License Agreement</a>. </p> 
                      <p> Product works in unlicensed mode for three days from the moment of installation. In this mode all the product features are unlocked same way as with trial license. After these three days either trial license or full license should be entered for product to function. </p> 
                      <ul> 
                       <li>To get Shopping Cart Web Part trial license click <a href="/products/sharepoint/sales/get-trial-license.aspx?ProductCode=SPSHCT001">here</a>.</li> 
                      </ul> 
                      <p> After ArtfulBits License Manager is installed, go to the SharePoint Central Administration page: </p> 
                      <table class="featurestable"> 
                       <tbody>
                        <tr> 
                         <td class="header"> SharePoint 2007 </td> 
                         <td class="header"> SharePoint 2010 </td> 
                        </tr> 
                        <tr> 
                         <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p> Choose "Operations".<br> Click on "ArtfulBits License Manager": </p> 
                          <div class="thumbnail"> 
                           <a href="../../images/sharepoint/generic/centraladministration-operations.png" title="Central Administartion > Operations"> <img src="../../images/sharepoint/generic/centraladministration-operations_tmb.png" width="200" height="161"> </a> 
                          </div> </td> 
                         <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p> Click on "ArtfulBits License Manager":</p> 
                          <div class="thumbnail"> 
                           <a href="../../images/sharepoint/generic/licensemanager_sp2010.png" title="Central Administartion"> <img src="../../images/sharepoint/generic/licensemanager_sp2010_tmb.jpg" width="200" height="217"> </a> 
                          </div> </td> 
                        </tr> 
                       </tbody>
                      </table> 
                      <p> This page shows all ArtfulBits installed products and their license statuses. </p> 
                      <div class="thumbnail"> 
                       <a href="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/license-manager.png" title="ArtfulBits License Manager"> <img src="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/license-manager_tmb.png" width="440" height="240"> </a> 
                      </div> 
                      <p> Click on product name to view license details. </p> 
                      <div class="thumbnail"> 
                       <a href="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/product-license-details.png" title="ArtfulBits License Manager"> <img src="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/product-license-details_tmb.png" width="440" height="221"> </a> 
                      </div> 
                      <p> If product is not licensed you can click "Enter License" link and enter license key (trial or full) into textbox. For upgrading product edition click "Convert License" and enter new license of target product edition. </p> 
                      <div class="thumbnail"> 
                       <a href="../../images/sharepoint/generic/key-entering.png" title="License Key entering"> <img src="../../images/sharepoint/generic/key-entering_tmb.jpg" width="440" height="149"> </a> 
                      </div> 
                      <p> Pressing "Activate" button will verify the key and in case of verification success license status will be updated. </p> 
                      <div class="thumbnail"> 
                       <a href="../../images/sharepoint/generic/product-activated.png" title="Product is activated"> <img src="../../images/sharepoint/generic/product-activated_tmb.png" width="440" height="102"> </a> 
                      </div> 
                      <p> Note: in trial or unlicensed mode all product features are available for evaluation. This way you will be able to try each and every feature available in the product line which will give you good understanding of what feature set will be necessary for you and it will be easier to come up with the decision which product edition should be purchased. After trial period expiration full license should be purchased which will determine product edition and available (unlocked) feature set. </p> 
                      <div id="ctl00_defHolder_InstallationProcess1_pExpiredInfo"> 
                       <p> Special link informing about product expiration is shown in SharePoint pages, where ArtfulBits component is used if product is using trial license or such license is "Expired" or no license is provided at all. Clicking on this link will redirect to product license status details page. </p> 
                       <div class="thumbnail"> 
                        <a href="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/License_Link.png" title="License info link"> <img src="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/License_Link_tmb.png" width="440"> </a> 
                       </div> 
                      </div> 
                     </div> 
                    </div> 
                    <h3> <a href="#"> 3. Activating / Deactivating Feature</a></h3> 
                    <div> 
                     <div id="ctl00_defHolder_InstallationProcess1_pFeatureSite"> 
                      <table class="featurestable"> 
                       <tbody>
                        <tr> 
                         <td colspan="2"> Click "Site Actions" menu in the root site of one site collection, then click "Site Settings": </td> 
                        </tr> 
                        <tr> 
                         <td class="header"> SharePoint 2007 </td> 
                         <td class="header"> SharePoint 2010 </td> 
                        </tr> 
                        <tr> 
                         <td> 
                          <div class="thumbnail"> 
                           <a href="../../images/sharepoint/generic/feature_site_settings.png" title="Site Settings"> <img src="../../images/sharepoint/generic/feature_site_settings_tmb.png" width="200" height="82"> </a> 
                          </div> </td> 
                         <td> 
                          <div class="thumbnail"> 
                           <a href="../../images/sharepoint/generic/feature_site_settings_sp2010.png" title="Site Settings"> <img src="../../images/sharepoint/generic/feature_site_settings_sp2010_tmb.jpg" width="200" height="310"> </a> 
                          </div> </td> 
                        </tr> 
                        <tr> 
                         <td colspan="2"> Click "Site collection features" link in Site Settings page: </td> 
                        </tr> 
                        <tr> 
                         <td class="header"> SharePoint 2007 </td> 
                         <td class="header"> SharePoint 2010 </td> 
                        </tr> 
                        <tr> 
                         <td> 
                          <div class="thumbnail"> 
                           <a href="../../images/sharepoint/generic/feature_sitecollectionfeatures.png" title="Site Collection Features"> <img src="../../images/sharepoint/generic/feature_sitecollectionfeatures_tmb.png" width="184" height="220"> </a> 
                          </div> </td> 
                         <td> 
                          <div class="thumbnail"> 
                           <a href="../../images/sharepoint/generic/feature_sitecollectionfeatures_sp2010.png" title="Site Collection Features"> <img src="../../images/sharepoint/generic/feature_sitecollectionfeatures_sp2010_tmb.jpg" width="200" height="236"> </a> 
                          </div> </td> 
                        </tr> 
                       </tbody>
                      </table> 
                      <p> In SharePoint Site collection feature list, activate ArtfulBits Shopping Cart Web Part feature (if deactivated):</p> 
                     </div> 
                     <div class="thumbnail"> 
                      <a href="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Feature_Activate.png" title="Activate feature"> <img src="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Feature_Activate_tmb.png" width="440" height="84"> </a> 
                     </div> 
                    </div> 
                    <h3> <a href="#"> 4. Product Upgrading</a> </h3> 
                    <div> 
                     <p> Process of updating Shopping Cart Web Part is pretty straightforward - just download latest <a href="shopping-cart.aspx#Download">installation package</a> and execute <b>Setup.exe</b> from it. After system check completes, select an "Upgrade" option and then follow setup wizard instructions. </p> 
                     <div class="thumbnail"> 
                      <a href="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/update.png" title="Upgrade"> <img src="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Update_tmb.png" width="440" height="384"> </a> 
                     </div> 
                    </div> 
                    <h3> <a href="#"> 5. Uninstallation / Repairing</a> </h3> 
                    <div> 
                     <p> Execute <b>Setup.exe</b> from your installation package. On the Repair and Remove section, select Remove radio button and click "Next", the Shopping Cart Web Part will be uninstalled. Or select "Repair" - to repair the Shopping Cart Web Part . </p> 
                     <div class="thumbnail"> 
                      <a href="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Uninstall.png" title="Uninstall"> <img src="http://artfulbits.com/images/sharepoint/shopping-cart/Uninstall_tmb.png" width="458" height="400" alt="Uninstall"> </a> 
                     </div> 
                    </div> 
                   </div> 
                   <!-- /Accordion --> 
                  </div> 
                 </div>

                     <tr id="ctl00_defHolder_Downloads1_tr4">

                   <h3> Release Notes </h3> 
                   <table class="sptable"> 
                    <tbody>
                     <tr> 
                      <th> Version </th> 
                      <th> Notes </th> 
                     </tr> 
                     <tr> 
                      <td class="versionCell"> v2.1 <br> (July 25, 2017) </td> 
                      <td class="notesCell"> <b>Improvements:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Updated French localization </li> 
                       </ul> <br> <b>Bugs fixed:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Fixed compatibility with previous Shopping Cart web part UI </li> 
                       </ul> </td> 
                     </tr> 
                     <tr> 
                      <td class="versionCell"> v2.0 <br> (April 27, 2017) </td> 
                      <td class="notesCell"> <b>New Features:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Add function to get field safe from list </li> 
                        <li> Add French localization </li> 
                       </ul> <br> <b>Improvements:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Updated Russian localization </li> 
                       </ul> <br> <b>Bugs fixed:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Fixed bug with buttons visibility for non-admin </li> 
                        <li> Fixed localization in web methods </li> 
                        <li> Fixed subcategory column visibility in edit product </li> 
                        <li> Fixed bug with category/subcategory filtering </li> 
                       </ul> </td> 
                     </tr> 
                     <tr> 
                      <td class="versionCell"> v1.94 <br> (November 1, 2016) </td> 
                      <td class="notesCell"> <b>New Features:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Added new type of field to order now form: Calendar </li> 
                        <li> Manage Orders Page </li> 
                        <li> Order now form supports user profile properties </li> 
                       </ul> <br> <b>Improvements:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Dropdowns in order now form can be made required </li> 
                        <li> Added friendly informational popups instead of alerts </li> 
                        <li> Alert is now shown when attempting to use spaces in the 'KEY' field in configure order now dialog </li> 
                       </ul> <br> <b>Bugs fixed:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Fixed problem with multiple destination emails in low stock reminder email </li> 
                       </ul> </td> 
                     </tr> 
                     <tr> 
                      <td class="versionCell"> v1.91 <br> (August 22, 2016) </td> 
                      <td class="notesCell"> <b>New Features:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Added a possibility to notify vendor about low inventory level </li> 
                        <li> Added a possibility of editing return order email </li> 
                        <li> Added Date/time to pick-up item for return </li> 
                       </ul> <br> <b>Improvements:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Enhanced options for editing order confirmation email </li> 
                        <li> Enhanced options for editing email notifications to the vendor </li> 
                       </ul> <br> <b>Bugs fixed:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Minor fixes </li> 
                       </ul> </td> 
                     </tr> 
                     <tr> 
                      <td class="versionCell"> v1.9 <br> (July 27, 2016) </td> 
                      <td class="notesCell"> <b>New Features:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Added Nintex Workflow support for History and Products lists </li> 
                        <li> Added Russian localization </li> 
                        <li> Added German localization </li> 
                       </ul> </td> 
                     </tr> 
                     <tr> 
                      <td class="versionCell"> v1.88 <br> (June 8, 2016) </td> 
                      <td class="notesCell"> <b>New Features:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Added option to show/hide sort and search section </li> 
                       </ul> <br> <b>Bugs fixed:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Minor fixes </li> 
                       </ul> </td> 
                     </tr> 
                     <tr> 
                      <td class="versionCell"> v1.87 <br> (May 30, 2016) </td> 
                      <td class="notesCell"> <b>New Features:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Added support for multiple values in Vendor email field </li> 
                       </ul> <br> <b>Bugs fixed:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Minor fixes </li> 
                       </ul> </td> 
                     </tr> 
                     <tr> 
                      <td class="versionCell"> v1.86 <br> (May 18, 2016) </td> 
                      <td class="notesCell"> <b>New Features:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Added last bidder and bidding winner email subject template </li> 
                        <li> Added a possibility to provide a reason for return </li> 
                        <li> Added a possibility to notify vendor, approvers and peers about the purchase at the same time </li> 
                       </ul> <br> <b>Bugs fixed:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Bug with NULL value in "vendor email" and "from" field </li> 
                       </ul> </td> 
                     </tr> 
                     <tr> 
                      <td class="versionCell"> v1.85 <br> (May 10, 2016) </td> 
                      <td class="notesCell"> <b>New Features:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Added SharePoint 2016 support </li> 
                        <li> Added client/vendor email subject template </li> 
                        <li> Stock count indicator may be switched off </li> 
                        <li> Added product return functionality </li> 
                        <li> Added possibility to save particular fields from order form to history list </li> 
                       </ul> <br> <b>Improvements:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Bidding winner is now notified via email message </li> 
                       </ul> </td> 
                     </tr> 
                     <tr> 
                      <td class="versionCell"> v1.83 <br> (February 23, 2016) </td> 
                      <td class="notesCell"> Bug fixes </td> 
                     </tr> 
                     <tr> 
                      <td class="versionCell"> v1.8 <br> (February 23, 2016) </td> 
                      <td class="notesCell"> UI and UX are significantly improved </td> 
                     </tr> 
                     <tr> 
                      <td class="versionCell"> v1.7 <br> (January 25, 2016) </td> 
                      <td class="notesCell"> <b>New Features:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Added integration with PayPal </li> 
                        <li> Added possibility to set up an auction for products </li> 
                        <li> Added counter of items left in stock </li> 
                       </ul> <br> <b>Improvements:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li>Indicators "Last Piece", "In Stock" and "Sold Out" for products </li> 
                        <li>Rearranged sorting </li> 
                        <li>Added highlighting for search by text results </li> 
                        <li>Added separate page for each product (accesible via url) </li> 
                        <li>Added UI for setting product price and stock count </li> 
                        <li>Added UI for constructing order form </li> 
                        <li>"Order saved" confirmation email to the client </li> 
                       </ul> <br> <b>Bugs fixed:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Bug with repeated orders fixed </li> 
                        <li> Minor fixes </li> 
                       </ul> </td> 
                     </tr> 
                     <tr> 
                      <td class="versionCell"> v1.62 <br> (October 15, 2015) </td> 
                      <td class="notesCell"> Minor bugs fixed. </td> 
                     </tr> 
                     <tr> 
                      <td class="versionCell"> v1.6 <br> (July 07, 2015) </td> 
                      <td class="notesCell"> <b>New Features:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Added "Send Email Upon Order" setting </li> 
                        <li> Added "Approvers" feature </li> 
                        <li> Added German localization </li> 
                       </ul> </td> 
                     </tr> 
                     <tr> 
                      <td class="versionCell"> v1.4 <br> (April 15, 2015) </td> 
                      <td class="notesCell"> <b>New Features:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Added ordering by Price </li> 
                        <li> Added main view filter and sorting </li> 
                        <li> Added second level of categorization (requires new list columns) </li> 
                        <li> Added option to show/hide product in the list (requires new list columns) </li> 
                        <li> "Order Now" form template can now contain dropdown fields </li> 
                       </ul> <br> <b>Improvements:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li>Product description and image now also displayed on "My Orders" tab </li> 
                       </ul> <br> <b>Bugs fixed:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li> Minor spelling fix </li> 
                        <li> Fixed crash when no license entered </li> 
                       </ul> </td> 
                     </tr> 
                     <tr> 
                      <td class="versionCell"> v1.1 <br> (November 19, 2014) </td> 
                      <td class="notesCell"> <b>New Features:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li>Added categorization by size and/or type</li> 
                        <li>Separate price values for any size and/or type combination</li> 
                        <li>Added image gallery</li> 
                        <li>Added site template for easy installation</li> 
                        <li>Added "Send From Email" setting</li> 
                        <li>Added "Price Template" setting</li> 
                       </ul> <br> <b>Improvements:</b><br> 
                       <ul> 
                        <li>Improved solution architecture </li> 
                        <li>Email and Price Templates can be edited using built-in SharePoint html editor </li> 
                       </ul> </td> 
                     </tr> 
                     <tr> 
                      <td class="versionCell"> v1.0 <br> (July 25, 2013) </td> 
                      <td class="notesCell"> <b>Initial Release</b> </td> 
                     </tr> 
                    </tbody>
                   </table>

                   <br> [ENT] - Enterprise edition
